Coporate and Commercial

CORPORATE AND COMMERCIAL

5A Jurists Consultancy Group regularly works with domestic and international clients on business formation and financing as well as myriad corporate transactions, contracts, securities, mergers, acquisitions, and joint ventures. Our clients have come to rely on our practical problem-solving skills and our know-how to optimize opportunities when they arise. Our experience in drafting and reviewing contracts enables us to quickly and economically address complicated business issues. About us

    5A is an Ethiopian consulting firm that aspires to be a full-service firm. With a legal team that has over 30 years of experience in advising and representing clients on a wide range of legal matters relating to business and investment in the country.
